• {{chart.day}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Chart } from '../models/Chart'; @Component({ selector: 'app-chart', templateUrl: './chart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./chart.component.scss'] }) export class ChartComponent implements OnInit{ charts!: Chart[]; ngOnInit(): void { this.charts = [ {percent: 0.25, day: 'mon'}, {percent: 0.5, day: 'tue'}, {percent: 0.25, day: 'wed'}, {percent: 0.25, day: 'thu'}, {percent: 0.25, day: 'fri'}, {percent: 0.25, day: 'sat'}, {percent: 0.25, day: 'sun'}, ] } }
